1234570.name: Star Fetchers : Episode 1
1234570.description:
Welcome to Episode 1 of Star Fetchers.
The saga continues as Sanyati and Zambezi head deeper into the dreaded Gray zone. They'll discover what it takes to be a real gangsta as they figure out the confusing world around them.

Episode 1 will be heavily retouched and worked on to provide a even more polished experience.
Will not be out for a while though, but please do wishlist the new Episode. Release dates, its price and its theme/story is not final at this moment.
This will be updated shortly
